name: Number Dash
description:
Buildbox Template

version 3.3.6+

Get yourself a great template !!

Race against an AI opponent and change your number along the way 

to overcome obstacles.

Included in this template:

Artwork

Different colour schemes

3 x Bdocs

7 levels.

Ways to improve this template?

Change the game name

Add your own objects & models to make it unique and stand out.

Add sound fx
